original_text:
Awake, awake, arm of the Lord,
    clothe yourself with strength!
Awake, as in days gone by,
    as in generations of old.
Was it not you who cut Rahab to pieces,
    who pierced that monster through?
korean_text: 여호와의 팔이여 깨소서 깨소서 능력을 베푸소서 옛날 옛시대에 깨신 것 같이 하소서 라합을 저미시고 용을 찌르신 이가 어찌 주가 아니시며

sentences.original_text: Awake, awake, arm of the Lord
Awake, as in days gone by
Was it not you who cut Rahab to pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 라합을 찢어빨지 않은 이가 당신이 아니었던가
그 괴물을 꿰뚫지 않은 이가 당신이 아니었던가
